settings.text: Here you'll find a list of the most commonly asked questions. If you do not find the answer you are looking for, please contact us at info@riderly.com

settings.heading: Do you ship internationally?
settings.row_content: The shipping cost for your order is calculated in the first step of the checkout process after you have chosen the destination country. The shipping cost does not include custom fees, which are charged by the customs in countries outside of the European Union.
